summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; revising water rates and charges effective April 1, 1989; revising the rates of credit for qualified low-income customers establishing certain positions; increasing expenditure allowance in the 1989 budget of the Water Department by appropriation of balances accumulating in the Water Fund; revising certain revenue estimates contained in the 1989 budget of the Water Department; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 21.04.430, 21.04.440, and 21.76.040, in connection therewith.
